feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v3.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: hide hidden fields on booking page by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13843
  • chore: update to see webhook creation error handling to see error in prod by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14071
  • chore: run migrations conditionally by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13925
  • fix: Remove the right date override on removal by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13988
  • fix: Do not refund payments when cancelling bookings by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13924
  • refactor: removes deprecated customPrisma for API by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14069
  • fix: Get dsyncData based on database by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14067
  • feat: lock event types for org users by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14000
  • fix: A bug fix by @Gabbar-v7 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14081
  • fix: Exclude current rescheduled booking from limit by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13870
  • fix: don't show 'send event details to' for team events by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14093
  • fix: Avoid CSP related warnings in console on booking pages. by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14072
  • refactor: Moving credential syncing to API by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13963

New Contributors

  • @Gabbar-v7 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14081

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v3.8.9...v3.9.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v3.9.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: deprecated code in new credential sync endpoints by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14116
  • fix: email embed displaying wrong date by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14128
  • fix: failing webhookTriggers cron job by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14104
  • chore: update github actions for platform by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14130
  • feat: support for platform wide webhooks by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14092
  • feat: add 2fa removal for admins by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14126
  • fix: date picker arrow positioning by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14129
  • fix: dynamic event length change on reschedule by @Shobana7 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14110
  • fix: booking limits for team event types by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14135
  • feat: golden verified badge for org members by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14131
  • fix: fix indicator size by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14125
  • fix: pass org slug to useSchedule by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14138
  • feat: display org banner on personal event types by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14101
  • style: Provide Visual Feedback to Users Upon Button Click to Indicate Processing Time #13553 by @murtaza030 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14137
  • chore: improve apple calendar message by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14139
  • fix: Crash of event types page if the upId is incorrect by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14136
  • fix: Minor UI fix to team profile / fallback to parent org logo by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14143

New Contributors

  • @Shobana7 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14110
  • @murtaza030 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14137

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v3.9.0...v3.9.1

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v3.9.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Some tests weren't running by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14145
  • fix: timezone display on booking page to reflect event availability timezone by @Shaik-Sirajuddin in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14127
  • fix: Adding 'hosts' instead of 'users' by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14105
  • fix: email displayed as organizer eventtype settings by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14102
  • feat: platform atoms + api v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14106
  • chore: hide org banner i hideEventTypeDetails is true by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14119
  • chore: Platform SDK by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14154
  • chore: adds Intercom admin link by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14146
  • fix: migrated users admin update by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14152
  • fix: improve defined slot start times by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14107
  • fix: Broken reschedule link in email created by workflow for team event by @Pritam-sd-dev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13893
  • fix: url query params dynamic url server side app router by @alannnc in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14076
  • fix: Allow team admins to create managed events by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14165
  • fix: rescheduling in round robin by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14109
  • refactor: availabilitySettings atoms web wrapper and translations by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14167
  • fix: url input field overflows when update profile & editing event by @rajats-dev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14033
  • feat: select team members to receive emails by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13957
  • feat: atoms as npm package by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14160
  • fix: revalidation replacing availability form values by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14114
  • refactor: dialog auto swap platform primitives by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14186
  • fix: bug in zapier when user has no bookings by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14159
  • fix: Adding missing multiple_duration_timeUnit on both zh-tw and zh-cn locales. by @antcar0929 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14181
  • fix: Attendee address and phone number field not shown in booking questions by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13989
  • fix: removing apps from team events by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14182
  • chore: moved GTM into signup by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14175
  • feat: prevent OAuth client creation for non platform orgs by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14200
  • feat: display connected calendars on platform calendars page by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14203
  • refactor: v2 API remove defaultScheduleId when creating a managed user by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14205
  • feat: distinguish managed platform users by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14207
  • fix: Fixes Jelly type mismatch and passes conference credential id when confirm bookings by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14209
  • feat: v2 api endpoints and hooks to list private and public event types of user by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14192
  • fix: instant meeting fixes by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14214
  • feat: SSO for orgs by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13794
  • feat: hide if team slider if org is private by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14201
  • feat: v1 api connected-calendars endpoint by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14176
  • feat: use unkey for global ratelimiting and identifier overrides by @chronark in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14173
  • chore: Bump all postgres:12 -> postgres:13.13 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14217

New Contributors

  • @Shaik-Sirajuddin made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14127
  • @rajats-dev made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14033
  • @antcar0929 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14181
  • @chronark made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14173

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v3.9.1...v3.9.2

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v3.9.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: bump GitHub postgres v2 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14220
  • feat: Migrate all old avatars to 'avatars' table by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14170
  • fix: add missing multiple_duration_timeUnit translation in zh-CN by @ZacharyJia in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14212
  • feat: platform endpoints to fetch/cancel/reschedule bookings and hooks by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14164
  • chore(ci): Add nextjs framework env vors to @calcom/website in turbo.json by @p6l-richard in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14231
  • chore: added vercel env to turbo repo by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14238
  • fix: embed env var EnvrionmentPlugin config by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14225
  • chore: rename platform endpoints provider/gcal by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14248
  • chore: rename platform /me endpoints by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14249
  • feat: implement serverside search ƒor org user table by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14234
  • feat: cal.ai enterprise phone calls by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14100
  • refactor: platform timezone endpoint by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14250
  • chore: add styling to examples app by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14252
  • chore: Select organization fields to prevent logo import by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14255
  • fix: Organization check by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14251
  • fix(translations/de): typo in limit_booking_only_first_slot by @philippdormann in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14244
  • chore: adds useful SQL scripts for devops by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14068
  • fix: No handlers found for ics-feed by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14123
  • refactor: prisma platform tables use pascal case by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14263
  • refactor: OAuth creation form hide apps permissions by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14264
  • fix: Bookings Teams filter shows double label by @Shyam-Raghuwanshi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14239
  • chore: Skip broken out-of-office tests by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14286
  • chore: rewrite api.cal.com/v2 to api v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14285

New Contributors

  • @ZacharyJia made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14212

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v3.9.2...v3.9.3

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v3.9.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: cancellation seems to be using slug instead of title by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14195
  • chore: add more duration options for multiple duration events by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14162
  • fix: Show proper actionable error in case the team can't be published by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14283
  • feat: v2 event-types POST, PATCH, DELETE endpoints by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14237
  • chore: remove cal-ai from nav by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14293
  • fix: Sentry DNS -> Sentry DSN by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14295
  • fix: Booker atom modal not rendering for mobile devices by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14278
  • fix: Platform Hotfixes by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14297
  • fix: Typo in OAuth clients by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14292
  • chore: SDK Fixes and add swagger docs by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14218

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v3.9.3...v3.9.4
